substitution.copyText: " Than is the Throne of Denmark to thy Father: | " What would'st thou have Laertes?
" And bow them to your gracious leave and pardon
" I do beseech you give him leave to go.
And thy best graces; spend it at thy will.
Ham. Not so much my Lord, I am too much in the Sun.
